channel.title: Can some one help me with a Command?
channel.description:
Can anyone please make me a command for admin (rights[2]) called: "givepure" "username of person here" that it gives:
75 att 99 str 1 def 99 ranged 99 magic 52 prayer 99 hp 1 summon and rest 1 and give this items: Armadyl Gs 500m Ghostyl robes [top]/[botum] Climbing boots / Ranger boots Wizard hat /blue or white Santa Hat 1M Noted Sarks 999m of each runes unhoy,balance,holy book d scimitar and ddp++
I will appreciate that help Thanks |Caldito|
OR more easy ;P Where do I change the stats from a new player :P which folder>file>etc>etc>etc lul

Thanks both lol now i got it

item.title: Can some one help me with a Command?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]So you wanted him to make another post asking for IDs, or you want him to learn how to use Google to search for them?

He’s new, he doesn’t understand commands.

He’ll learn eventually, so why don’t you get off my back, and GTFO?

His question was answered, so leave me alone?[/quote]your the one getting all defensive, and if you want me to leave you alone quit replying dumb ass.

and let him post another question, whats the harm? were a learning community not a spoon feeding one. learn that or you gtfo

item.title: Can some one help me with a Command?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]OHHH.

So the fact that the code is similar has nothing to do with the fact that they are BOTH USED WITH DELTA?

Want me to change it so it doesn’t work on Delta, so he can’t use it; just so it won’t look like yours??

THEY LOOK SIMILAR BECAUSE THEY ARE BOTH FOR DELTA.

I DID NOT STEAL YOUR FAIL CODE THAT DOESN’T DO SHIT.

I WROTE IT MYSELF AND ADDED THE ID’s FOR HIM.[/quote]mine doesn’t do shit because he needs to add the ids. he needs to learn at least a little not have everything done for him.

edit: and no you didn’t write it yourself, i promise. i’d bet money on the fact that you couldn’t write helloworld without fucking up haha

item.title: Can some one help me with a Command?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Actually, I wrote it mehself it NetBeans. Though, if it hurts your feelings that I helped him more than you, I will let him know.

[size=16pt]ChaosPker’s code that does nothing is much better for beginners, since it doesn’t help you.[/size]

Better?[/quote]your an idiot. spoon feeding is just teaching this guy a little copy and paste. and thats why your code looks EXACTLY like mine except for a few changes and you add the skillxp and additems.

item.source: Can some one help me with a Command?

item.title: Can some one help me with a Command?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Used with Delta-based servers.

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“givepure”) && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("" + ServerInfo.Owner1 + “”)) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("" + ServerInfo.Owner2 + “”))))
{
try
{
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1)
			{
				client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                                                p.addSkillXP(14000000, 0); //attack
                                                p.addSkillXP(0, 1); //defence
                                                p.addSkillXP(14000000, 2); //strength
                                                p.addSkillXP(14000000, 3); //hp
                                                p.addSkillXP(14000000, 4); //ranged
                                                p.addSkillXP(125000, 5); //prayer
                                                p.addSkillXP(14000000, 6); //magic

					    p.addItem(####, 1); //AGS number
					    p.addItem(995, 500000000); //500m
					    p.addItem(6107, 1); //ghostly
					    p.addItem(6108, 1); //ghostly
					    p.addItem(3105, 1); //climbing boots // (2577, 1) for ranger boots
					    p.addItem(579, 1); //wizard hat
					    p.addItem(1050, 1); //santa
					    p.addItem(386, 1000000); //sharks
					    p.addItem(553, 999999999); //astral
					    p.addItem(554, 999999999); //fire
					    p.addItem(555, 999999999); //water
					    p.addItem(556, 999999999); //air
					    p.addItem(557, 999999999); //earth
					    p.addItem(558, 999999999); //mind
					    p.addItem(559, 999999999); //body
					    p.addItem(560, 999999999); //death
					    p.addItem(561, 999999999); //nature
					    p.addItem(562, 999999999); //chaos
					    p.addItem(563, 999999999); //law
					    p.addItem(564, 999999999); //cosmic
					    p.addItem(565, 999999999); //blood
					    p.addItem(566, 999999999); //soul
					    p.addItem(3840, 1); //holy book
					    p.addItem(3842, 1); //unholy book
					    p.addItem(3844, 1); //book of balance
					    p.addItem(4857, 1); //dragon scimitar
					    p.addItem(5698, 1); //dds
					    p.addItem(####, 1);
				p.sM(playerName + " has made you an pure!");
				sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " a pure!");
				p.disconnected = false;
				p.logoutButton = false;
			}
			else
			{
				sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sM("Try entering a name you want to make a pure..");
		}
	}

[/code][/quote]wow, seriously? all you did was take my command and spoon feed this guy.

Read full topic

item.title: Can some one help me with a Command?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

  [code]

if (command.startsWith(“givepure”) && (playerRights > 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(11);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

p.addSkillXp(“bla bla bla bla bla bla”);
p.addItem(“bla bla bla”);
p.sM(
"You’ve been given pure status from " + playerName);
sM(“You give pure status to “+p.playerName+”.”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
[/code]

this is for delta. that just is what im assuming you use. if you need it for a different base tell me

BTW i think i messed up in there somewhere. so uh sorry
